title: ‘Fall River’ Review: A Small Town’s ‘Satanic Panic’
sub_head: A docuseries on Epix explores three murders that racked the Massachusetts community best known as Lizzie Borden’s hometown.
body:
Lizzie Borden has legs, as they say in show business, and has since 1892, when a vicious double murder in Fall River, Mass., gave birth to a famously twisted children’s rhyme:
Lizzie Borden took an axe,
And gave her mother forty whacks.
When she saw what she had done,
She gave her father forty-one.
